services.title: Threading
description: Remove facial hair by using cotton thread to quickly grab and pull hair by the roots. It is a great way to shape eyebrows and also be used to quickly remove any facials hairs like forehead, upper lip, chin, neck, sides, side burns, eyebrows.

services.title: Waxing
description: Waxing is a process of hair removal; that use strip wax or hard wax to effectively to remove the hair from the roots, to leave the skin smooth and even.  Waxing can be done on face which includes eyebrows, upper lip, chin, neck sideburns, forehead, nose, and inside nose and ears. It can be used on body as well, for bikini, Brazilian, feet, leg, arms, hands, underarms, buttocks, back, neck, chest, nipple.
Men’s bikini and Brazilian can be done as well.

Facial overall in skin cleaning process in which we exfoliate, apply steam treatment, remove blackheads, apply scrubs, mask to cleanse the skin to reduce acne, wrinkles, giving you an overall healthy skin to radiate the skin.

services.title: Tinting
description: Enhances the color of the eyebrows

services.title: Brow lamination
description: Brow lamination is almost like a perm for your eyebrows, it involves straightening and liftings of hair using a chemical solution which allows the hair fuller, thicker and feathery look.

services.title: Teen Facial
description: Facials geared to teens or teenagers to help cleanse blackheads, reduce Acne problems to improve the overall health of the skin.

services.title: Express Facial
description: Mini Facials where we apply steam, cleansing, removal of blackheads and apply mask to the skin ideal for clients that have a short amount of time for example lunch breaks.

services.title: Traditional Facial
description: Basic facial to routinely maintain the skin cleansing, exfoliate, steam, removal of blackheads, massage and mask.  Benefit of facial is keeps skin clean, and reduce Acne.

services.title: Soothing back facial
description: Facial geared to one’s back where we exfoliate, apply steam treatment, remove blackheads, apply scrubs, mask to cleanse the skin to reduce dead cells on the back.

services.title: Detoxifying Facial
description: Great for to clean the pores, reduce wrinkles, moisturize your face.*

services.title: LED Light Facial
description: Facial service that focuses on skin issues for skin cares, helps with anti-aging, reducing inflammations, increases amount of collagen in skin to reduce the amount of wrinkles on the skin. It helps with eczema, mild or moderate acne, rosacea, sun damage and other benefits.

services.title: Microdermabrasion
description: Microdermabrasion is noninvasive procedure that exfoliates and remove the superficial layer of dry, dead skin cells. Helps fight sun damage, fine lines, wrinkles, scars, rough skin texture and large pores, ingrown hair, shaving rash.

services.title: Dermaplaning Facial
description: Facial for all skin types, which is a non-invasive procedure where it helps to exfoliate the skin with fine hair (Peach Fuzz) removal. It helps penetrate the product deeper into skin  which helps rejunvate the skin to make the skin look nice and smooth. Great mechanical exfoliator which will remove the fine hairs from the face to improve the overall skin health.

services.title: Micro Hydra Facial
description: Facial that leverages hydradermabrsion treatment to the skin. The infusion of serums into the facial will improve the skin texture & appearance. Additional benefits including glowing of the skin.

services.title: Vitamin C Facial
description: Opens channels to penetrate deeper into the skin, to increase skin’s collagen production to tighten, give fuller skin, and reduce wrinkle appearance.  Vitamin C helps fight aging of the skin, repair the damage caused by UV rays and helps smoothen the skin.

services.title: Gold Facial
description: Gold facials consist of glittering 24 K gold leaf facials, there are 2 different gold facials (Gold collagen facial, and 24k Gold leaf facial), so here at here at Rupi Brows & Esthetics Studio we combine both to get the best benefits from both products to help in reduction of wrinkles and fines lines making your skin look youthful.  It helps with improving with blood circulation, brighten your face, help with dullness from sun damage and it provides your skin with oxygen to which makes you look less tired.

services.title: Skin Brightening Facial
description: Skin Brightening facial helps with hyper pigmentation, evens out skin the skin tone, leaves the skin nourished, reduces blemishes and gets rid of dead skin cells to leave the skin smoother and radiant.

services.title: Acne Reduction Facial
description: Acne facials reduce the symptoms of Acne breakouts by deep pore cleaning of blackheads, white heads which help with acne, minor blemishes with skin impurities, unclogging pores, and reducing of oil production and inflammation of the skin.

services.title: Anti-Aging Facial
description: Facials for the mature skin which helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles, helps to penetrate the skin surface, and works to lift up the skin to improve the skin’s elasticity for face and neck to make the skin tighter and youthful.

services.title: Oxygen Infusion Facial
description: Oxygen Facial uses oxygen to the improve the overall appearance of the skin. Oxygen facials increase the collogen production by increasing the cell turnover. Due the nature of Oxygen having anti-inflammatory properties, it will help reduce the appearance of Acne or Blemishes.  Many benefits include Hydration of the skin, reduction of blemishes and Acne, stimulate collagen production, and improve overall skin texture.

services.title: Bikini Waxing
description: Our bikini waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the bikini area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Brazilian Waxing
description: Our Brazilian waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the bikini area, including your more sensitive areas. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Butt Waxing
description: Our butt waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the buttocks area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Underarm Waxing
description: Our underarm waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the underarm area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Half Arm Waxing
description: Our half arm waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the underarm area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Full Arm Waxing
description: Our full arm waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the underarm area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Upper Legs Waxing
description: Our upper-leg waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the underarm area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Lower Legs Waxing
description: Our lower leg waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the underarm area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Full Legs Waxing
description: Our full leg waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the underarm area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Back Waxing
description: Our back waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the back area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Stomach Waxing
description: Our stomach waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the stomach area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Chest Waxing
description: Our chest waxing service is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the stomach area. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.

services.title: Micro Needling
description: A procedure that uses tiny needles to treat scars, large pores and wrinkles. It helps with Acne, dark spots, hyper pigmentation, large pores reduce skin elasticity, sun damage, and fine lines and wrinkles.

services.title: Pro Cell Therapy
description: A non-invasive skin rejuvenating procedure which helps improve the appearance of fine line hyper pigmentation, acne scarring, aging, congested skin, wrinkles and help with the complexion to look brighter.

services.title: Chemical Peel
description: It is a type chemical exfoliating that dissolves the bond between dead skin cells allowing them easily wipe away to reveal smoother , younger , healthier looking skin.
Concerns: Fine line, sun damage, blackheads, clogged pores, acne marks and scars, age spots, uneven skin tone and hyper pigmentation.
Results: Smoothness, radiance, clean skin, tightness, lifted appearance, balanced tone, softness, firmer skin.

services.title: Lash Lift
description: Lash lift is essentially perm for your lashes which gives the appearance of fuller, thicker and healthier look without leave on chemicals. It helps with the growth of lashes and last up to 4 -6 weeks with proper care.

services.title: Intense Pulse Light (IPL) Therapy
description: Intense Pulse Light (IPL) is a cosmetic skin treatment may use to reduce the sign of aging or remove unwanted hair.

services.title: Laser Hair Removal
description: Laser hair removal effectively removes unwanted hair by mean of exposure to the pulse of laser light that destroys the hair follicle. The effect last for several months or it might last for year. When hair regrows, it is usually finer and lighter in color.
